Text.Language: His foundations are in the holy mountains. The Lord loves the gates of Zion, more than all the dwellings of Jacob. Glorious things have been spoken of You, O city of God.

I shall make mention of Rahab and Babylon, those who know me; behold the foreigners, and Tyre, and the people of Ethiopia, these were there. â€œMy mother Zion,â€? a man will say; and a man was living in her, and the Most High Himself has founded her forever. The Lord shall tell it in the writings of peoples and princes, these who were in her. The dwelling of all who rejoice is within you. ALLELUIA.
